Privacy

Privacy Policy

Last updated: 19 December 2025

Overview

This Privacy Policy explains how personal information is collected and handled when you visit syedbokhari.com.au and when you contact Syed Bokhari (NDIS Behaviour Support Practitioner). This site is intended for professional enquiries and general contact.

What information may be collected

If you contact me via the website contact form, email, or phone, the information collected may include:

  • Your name
  • Your email address
  • Your phone number (if provided)
  • The content of your message
  • Technical information such as IP address and browser details (via standard internet logs)

How information is used

Personal information is used for purposes such as:

  • Responding to enquiries and communicating with you
  • Managing professional enquiries and service discussions
  • Improving website reliability and security

Contact form processing

The contact form on this website is processed by a third-party service (Formspree). When you submit the form, the information you enter is transmitted to Formspree to deliver your message. Form submissions may be stored by Formspree and forwarded to the nominated email address.

If you prefer not to use the form, you can contact me directly by email or phone.

Sensitive information

Please do not include sensitive personal information in the website contact form. If you are an NDIS participant (or contacting on behalf of one), sensitive details should be shared only through appropriate, secure channels after initial contact and confirmation of arrangements.

Disclosure of personal information

Personal information is not sold. It may be disclosed only where reasonably necessary to:

  • Respond to your enquiry (for example, communicating with you or relevant provider contacts you nominate)
  • Meet legal or regulatory obligations
  • Maintain safety and reduce risk where serious concerns arise

Storage and security

Reasonable steps are taken to protect personal information from misuse, interference, loss, unauthorised access, modification, or disclosure. However, no method of transmission over the internet is completely secure.

Access and correction

You may request access to personal information held about you and request corrections if you believe it is inaccurate, out of date, incomplete, irrelevant, or misleading.

How to contact

For privacy-related enquiries, contact:

Email: syed@syedbokhari.com.au · Phone: 0411 072 466

Emergency notice: This website is not monitored for urgent matters. If there is immediate risk or emergency, call 000.
NDIS Behaviour Support Practitioner
Behaviour Support Practitioner application submitted and pending. Services provided consistent with applicable NDIS requirements.
